  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2724</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Changes in locations of the continents since 150 million years ago</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seit ändert in den Standorten der Kontinente 150
Million Jahren vor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Change dans les emplacements des continents 
depuis il y a 150 millions d'ans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Muda nas posições dos continentes desde 150 
milhão anos há</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambia nelle posizioni dei continenti da 150 
milione anni fa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγές στις θέσεις των ηπείρων από 150 
εκατομμύριο έτη πριν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambia en las localizaciones de los continentes 
desde hace 150 millones de años</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the changes undergone in the position of the continents and islands in the last 150 milion years until tosay</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plate tectonics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">continental drift</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Änderungen zeigt, die in
der Position der Kontinente und der Inseln in den letzten 150 milion 
Jahren durchgemacht werden, bis tosay</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre les changements subis
de la position des continents et des îles en 150 dernières années 
de milion jusqu'à ce que tosay</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre as mudanças 
submetidas na posição dos continentes e dos consoles nos últimos 
150 anos do milion até que tosay</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che non dimostra i cambiamenti 
subiti nella posizione dei continenti e delle isole durante i 150 anni
scorsi di milion fino a che tosay</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τις αλλαγές που 
υποβάλλονται στη θέση των ηπείρων και των νησιών τα τελευταία 
150 χρόνια milion μέχρι tosay</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra los cambios 
experimentados en la posición de los continentes y de las islas en 
los 150 años pasados del milion hasta que es tosay</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plattentektonik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kontinentaltrift</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
